Interrupts.Name: Too Rich to Care
Interrupts.Trigger: The Baron or an ally in range 3 is targeted by an ability.
Interrupts.Effects: The target gains resistance and unstoppable against the ability.

Actions.Name: Lucky Day
Actions.Description: A character in range 6 gains a valuables token.

Actions.Name: Fortune Maker
Actions.Description: The Baron chooses an ally or allied summon in range 4 and motivates them with promises of extreme wealth. That ally is marked.
Actions.Mark: While marked, they gain +1 boon on all attacks and saves.

Actions.Name: Problem Solver
Actions.Description: The Baron summons an Arkentech Mercenary.

Summons.Name: Arkentech Mercenary
Summons.SummonEffects: When summoned, or on the baron's turn, may move 4 spaces, then takes one of the following summon actions:

Actions.Name: Arkentech Force Beam
Actions.Effects: All foes in range 3 of the Baron take [fray] damage. Shove all affected foes 1 either away from or towards the Baron.

Actions.Name: Pay Off
Actions.Description: The Baron gives a foe in range 6 a valuables token. That foe must then save or become marked.
Actions.Mark: While marked and holding at least one valuables token, they are pacified+.

Actions.Name: Count Money
Actions.Description: The Baron gains 6 Assets, gains resistance, and becomes unstoppable until the start of their next turn.
